src.enums
Enum DamageType

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<DamageType>
      src.enums.DamageType
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DamageType>
public enum DamageType
extends java.lang.Enum<DamageType>

Enums to keep track of damage types for weapons. Damage types will determine whether or not a weapon is capable of breaking weapons, destroying armor, burning money, or destroying all items.

Author:
Darren Watts date 11/11/07
